definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
lit. heroism reaching to the clouds (idiom)

sentences.english: Send to cup in hand Feng feather in front, the tone of the Yi breeze also joined heroism.
sentences.chinese: 將手中杯子送到鳳羽面前，逸風的語氣也添了豪氣。

sentences.english: My might would shadow the world;
sentences.chinese: 我的豪氣可以庇護天下。

sentences.english: Do you want to have a luxury area?
sentences.chinese: 你想擁有一個盡顯奢華，豪氣蓬勃的領域嗎？

sentences.english: This is a word of heroism, but in fact is a nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 這是一句很豪氣的話，不過實際上是句廢話。

sentences.english: The sword points northward with heroism burning.
As the lofty spirit of mine now rising high.
sentences.chinese: 應該就像現在我的豪氣那樣高升入雲。

definition: distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
